    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(Controller controller,
                 GameView oldView)
        Description copied from class: GameView
        Loades some files and set up everything. After this has been inactive use GameView.onEnter() This method is a an implementation of the Setter Inejction pattern.
        Overrides:
        init in class GameView
        Parameters:
        controller - The dependent data controller used for the view. Can be null but should not.
        oldView - The view used before. Can be null.
        See Also:
        GameView.onEnter()
